Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Constance
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey and 79th due to fire department activity near 79th/Constance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey, then resume their normal route on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to fire department activity near 79th/Constance.

Headline: #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near 95th/Michigan
ShortDescription: Southbound 3 King Drive and 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted, due to: street blockage near 95th/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 100th, State, and resume normal route due to, street blockage near 95th/Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Southbound #119 Michigan/119th and #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 100th, Michigan, and resume normal route due to, street blockage near 95th/Michigan.

Headline: #111 King Drive/111th and  #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Michigan
ShortDescription: 111 King Drive/111th and 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Michigan due street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 King Drive/111th and  #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Michigan due street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via 95th, King Drive, 100th, Michigan, 95th and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 100th, King Drive, 95th and resume normal route.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Michigan
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Michigan due street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Michigan due street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via King Drive, 100th, Michigan, 95th and resume normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 100th, King Drive, 95th and resume normal route.
